--- title: "EPL Pre-season 2025" author: Christina date: "2025-07-21" categories: [Data Viz, football, reactable, EPL, Premier League] format: html theme: lumen editor: visual embed-resources: true link-external-newwindow: true link-external-icon: true toc: true toc-location: left execute: echo: false bibliography: references.bib csl: apa.csl image: "/images/header.png" --- # Intro The English Premier League (EPL) pre-season is underway. Burnley are the earliest to get going whilst Chelsea will be the latest to do their work due to their FIFA Club World Cup exploits. There's no doubt that pre-season matters a lot to managers and clubs. Exactly how it matters is another question. What is clear is that it's vital preparation ahead of a gruelling season to come. It's a time for fitness, opportunities for youth, team bonding, squad building and tactical trials among other things. Match outcomes are largely meaningless, but can influence the narrative, tone and group morale heading into the new campaign. So far over 90 pre-season matches are scheduled for EPL clubs.

This post summarizes pre-season schedules for each EPL team ahead of the 2025/2026 campaign that begins on August 15th 2025. Updates will be provided periodically. ::: {.callout-important appearance="default"} ## Last update: July 21st 2025 ::: The following R packages were used: `tidyverse`\ `reactable`\ `reactablefmtr`\ `htmltools`\ [@Wickham2019; @Lin2025; @Cuilla2022; @Cheng2025] ## ![](images/arsenal.svg){width="30"} Arsenal Arsenal began their pre-season preparations on July 9th, followed by a training camp in Spain. They will tour Singapore and Hong Kong. A total of 6 pre-season games are currently scheduled. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

Arsenal pre-season schedule

``` ::: ::: ## ![](images/astonvilla.svg){width="30"} Aston Villa Aston Villa began their pre-season preparations on July 7th. They will tour the USA, whilst also travelling to Germany, France and Spain ahead of their season opener. A total of 8 pre-season games are currently scheduled. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

Aston Villa pre-season schedule

``` ::: ::: ## ![](images/bournemouth.svg){width="25"} Bournemouth Bournemouth began their pre-season preparations on July 5th. They will tour the USA. A total of 7 pre-season games are currently scheduled. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

Bournemouth pre-season schedule

``` ::: ::: ## ![](images/brentford.svg){width="30"} Brentford Brentford began their pre-season preparations on July 7th, followed by a training camp in Portugal. A total of 3 pre-season games are currently scheduled. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

Brentford pre-season schedule

``` ::: ::: ## ![](images/brighton.svg){width="30"} Brighton Brighton began their pre-season preparations on July 5th followed by a training camp in Spain. A total of 5 pre-season games are currently scheduled. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

Brighton pre-season schedule

``` ::: ::: ## ![](images/burnley.svg){width="30"} Burnley Burnley began their pre-season preparations on June 30th followed by a training camp in Portugal. A total of 6 pre-season games are currently scheduled. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

Burnley pre-season schedule

``` ::: ::: ## ![](images/chelsea.svg){width="30"} Chelsea Chelsea’s pre-season preparations are delayed due to their participation in the Club World Cup which ended on July 13th. A total of 2 pre-season games are currently scheduled. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

Chelsea pre-season schedule

``` ::: ::: ## ![](images/crystalpalace.svg){width="30"} Crystal Palace Crystal Palace began their pre-season preparations on July 9th followed by a training camp in Austria. A total of 5 pre-season games are currently scheduled. They will take part in the Community Shield on August 10th. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

Crystal Palace pre-season schedule

``` ::: ::: ## ![](images/everton.svg){width="30"} Everton Everton began their pre-season preparations on July 4th followed by a training camp in Scotland. They will tour the USA. A total of 6 pre-season games are currently scheduled. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

Everton pre-season schedule

``` ::: ::: ## ![](images/fulham.svg){width="25"} Fulham Fulham began their pre-season preparations on July 13th followed by a training camp in Portugal. A total of 3 pre-season games are currently scheduled. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

Fulham pre-season schedule

``` ::: ::: ## ![](images/leeds.svg){width="30"} Leeds Leeds began their pre-season preparations on July 7th followed by a training camp in Germany. A total of 5 pre-season games are currently scheduled with stops in Sweden, Germany and Ireland included. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

Leeds pre-season schedule

``` ::: ::: ## ![](images/liverpool.png){width="25"} Liverpool Liverpool began their pre-season preparations on July 8th. They will tour Hong Kong and Japan. A total of 6 pre-season games are currently scheduled. They will take part in the Community Shield on August 10th. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

Liverpool pre-season schedule

``` ::: ::: ## ![](images/mancity.svg){width="30"} Manchester City Manchester City’s pre-season preparations are delayed due to their participation in the Club World Cup which ended on June 30th . A total of 1 pre-season game is currently scheduled. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

Man City pre-season schedule

``` ::: ::: ## ![](images/manunited.svg){width="30"} Manchester United Manchester United began their pre-season preparations on July 7th . Following a game in Sweden, they will tour the USA. A total of 5 pre-season games are currently scheduled. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

Man United pre-season schedule

``` ::: ::: ## ![](images/newcastle.svg){width="30"} Newcastle Newcastle began their pre-season preparations on July 7th followed by a training camp in Austria. Following a game in Scotland, they will tour Singapore and South Korea. A total of 7 pre-season games are currently scheduled. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

Newcastle pre-season schedule

``` ::: ::: ## ![](images/nottinghamforest.svg){width="25"} Nottingham Forest Nottingham Forest began their pre-season preparations on July 7th followed by a training camp in Portugal. A total of 7 pre-season games are currently scheduled. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

Nottingham Forest pre-season schedule

``` ::: ::: ## ![](images/sunderland.svg){width="30"} Sunderland Sunderland began their pre-season preparations on July 4th followed by a training camp in Portugal. A total of 8 pre-season games are currently scheduled with stops in Portugal, Scotland and Germany included. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

Sunderland pre-season schedule

``` ::: ::: ## ![](images/tottenham.svg){width="25"} Tottenham Tottenham began their pre-season preparations on July 5th . They will tour Hong Kong and South Korea before a stop in Germany. A total of 5 pre-season games are currently scheduled. They will take part in the UEFA Super Cup on August 13th . ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

Tottenham pre-season schedule

``` ::: ::: ## ![](images/westham.svg){width="30"} West Ham West Ham began their pre-season preparations on July 7th followed by a training camp in Germany. They will tour the USA, after a game in Switzerland. A total of 5 pre-season games are currently scheduled. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

West Ham pre-season schedule

``` ::: ::: ## ![](images/wolves.svg){width="30"} Wolves Wolves began their pre-season preparations on July 7th followed by a training camp in Portugal. A total of 6 pre-season games are currently scheduled with stops in Portugal and Spain included. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}

Wolves pre-season schedule
